__TOC__

Interlock Rochester and the NY State Ubuntu Local Team co-sponsored a hands-on Linux workshop. Today cprofitt helped two people install VirtualBox on their Ubuntu systems and cws helped update another users kernel so that it had support for this Atheros wireless card. This was a great follow-up to the lightening talk cprofitt did on VirtualBox.
